column1: pay_homage.0001.desc0:"I have arrived in [homage_liege.GetCapitalLocation.GetTitle.GetNameNoTierNoTooltip] to pay homage to you
column2: glorious [homage_liege.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip]
column3: as a show of my loyalty. \n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0001.desc.submission0:"I hope my pledge of submission alone is evidence enough of my honor."
pay_homage.0001.desc.gold0:"I bring you rich gifts worthy of your majesty
column2: as a token of my good will and servitude."

column1: pay_homage.0001.desc.hook0:"You have my word that I will do whatever it is you wish of me
column2: my [homage_liege.GetLadyLord]."

column1: pay_homage.0001.desc.contract0:"To mark your dominion and my fealty to you
column2: I will pledge greater obligations as your vassal."

column1: # Activity End:" Vassal learns that liege refuses to hear petition"

column1: pay_homage.0009.desc0:"I am not fooled by your [homage_vassal.Custom('InsultAdjective')] act; a pledge of homage from you would mean nothing to me."
# Liege Event:" Liege receives homage from vassal"
pay_homage.0101.desc0:"I wait patiently on my throne for the arrival of [homage_vassal.GetTitledFirstName]
column2: who is soon announced and ushered before me. \n\n"
offering nothing but [homage_vassal.GetHerHis] oath to faithfully serve as a vassal of the [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetTierAsNameNoTooltip].\n\n"
as attendants bring forth [homage_vassal.GetHerHis] gifts of coin and precious objects. The oath is taken
column3: and scribes record [homage_vassal.GetHerHis] pledges to serve [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTooltip].\n\n"

column2: and
column3: among [homage_vassal.GetHerHis] other oaths to serve [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTooltip]
column4: puts [homage_vassal.GetHerselfHimself] at my disposal and in my debt.\n\n"

column2: and
column3: among [homage_vassal.GetHerHis] other oaths to serve [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTooltip]
column4: offers me greater contributions as a vassal lord of the [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetTierAsNameNoTooltip].\n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0101.desc.language0:"Though the [homage_vassal.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] has clearly practiced the [homage_liege.GetCourtLanguage.GetNameNoTooltip] vows
column2: [homage_vassal.GetSheHe] mispronounces several sections
column3: humorously changing their meaning and leaving my courtiers stifling titters."

column2: [homage_vassal.GetSheHe] stumbles awkwardly. The court gasps in unison as [homage_vassal.GetSheHe] falls
column3: ending sprawled at my feet

column2: looking awkward. From the corner of my eye I notice my [SCOPE.sC('homage_liege').Custom2('RelationToMeShort'
column3: SCOPE.sC('homage_infatuation'))] [homage_infatuation.GetFullName] swooning

column1: pay_homage.0101.desc.delivery0:"Things do not go well from the outset. [homage_vassal.Custom('GetHomageDeliveryDescLiege')]"
pay_homage.0101.desc.success0:"At last I bid the [homage_vassal.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] arise
column2: confirming my satisfaction
column3: and [homage_vassal.GetFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] rights to the lands [homage_vassal.GetSheHe] rules in my stead."

pay_homage.0101.faux_pas.clumsy0:"Your oaths are all that matter to me."""""
pay_homage.0101.faux_pas.infatuation0:"Ahem... I think we are done here."""""

# Vassal Event:" Vassal hears how it went"
pay_homage.0201.desc0:"Servants usher me into [homage_liege.GetTitledFirstNamePossessiveRegnal] great hall in [homage_liege.GetCapitalLocation.GetNameNoTooltip]
column2: where [homage_liege.GetSheHe] sits [homage_liege.GetHerHis] throne waiting to hear my pledge.\n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0201.desc.language0:"I kneel before [homage_liege.GetHerHim] and recite the [homage_liege.GetCourtLanguage.GetNameNoTooltip] oaths I have practiced
column2: but the half-concealed chuckles of the court make it clear my tongue needs more practice in my liege's court language...\n\n"
but in my haste awkwardly stumble in a heap at [homage_liege.GetHerHis] feet. I haul myself up and make the oaths all the same
column3: my cheeks burning red before the assembled court...\n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0201.desc.infatuation0:"I kneel before [homage_liege.GetHerHim] and begin. As I recount the oaths
column2: I catch the eye of [homage_infatuation.GetFullName]
column3: [SCOPE.sC('homage_liege').Custom2('RelationToMeShort'
column6: with a deliberate wink. Looking back at my liege
column7: I am met with [homage_liege.GetHerHis] glare! I wrap up the speech
column8: averting my eyes as the court mutters their gossip...\n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0201.desc.delivery0:"I kneel before [homage_liege.GetHerHim] and begin uttering the oaths
column2: but things quickly fall apart. [homage_vassal.Custom('GetHomageDeliveryDescVassal')]\n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0201.desc.success0:"I kneel at the feet of my [homage_liege.GetLadyLord] and pledge the many oaths of homage
column2: as [homage_liege.GetHerHis] scribes record the event.\n\n"

the ceremony is complete; I have nothing to offer my [homage_liege.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] except my promise to faithfully serve as a vassal of the [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetTierAsNameNoTooltip].\n\n"
presenting my rich gifts to the [homage_liege.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] before the assembled court.\n\n"
that [homage_liege.GetSheHe] may call on me for any favor
column3: as a loyal supporter of the [homage_liege.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] in all [homage_liege.GetHerHis] endeavors.\n\n"

column1: pay_homage.0201.desc.contract0:"Then comes my gift; I affirm that will increase my contributions to the [homage_liege.GetPrimaryTitle.GetTierAsNameNoTooltip] as a sign of my loyalty and for the good of the crown.\n\n"

column2: then erupts with laughter
column3: parroting my mispronounced pledges in a poor [homage_vassal.GetCulture.GetLanguage.GetNameNoTooltip] accent..."

column2: as the court slowly fills with laughter. This is how I will be remembered..."
SCOPE.sC('homage_infatuation'))] angrily
column3: and dismisses me from the chamber without recognition."

column2: cackling as [homage_liege.GetSheHe] recounts parts of my speech in detail..."
[homage_liege.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] acts almost as if nothing had happened
column3: and accepts my homage with grace.\n\n"

column2: and confirms [homage_liege.GetHerHis] satisfaction
column3: along with my rights to the lands I rule in [homage_liege.GetHerHis] stead."

column1: pay_homage.0201.smooth.hook0:"Let us hope it is small favor..."

homage_delivery_stutter_liege0:"[ROOT.Char.GetTitledFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] barely reaches halfway through a sentence before [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis] stammer cuts [ROOT.Char.GetHerHim] short. My pained courtiers watch [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis] valiant attempts to conquer [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis] voice."
homage_delivery_lisp_liege0:"[ROOT.Char.GetTitledFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] speech is... memorable. [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis] sigmatism takes the edge off its gravity
column2: as [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] navigates its many sibilant sounds
column3: and tries to ignore the giggles of my less generous courtiers."

column1: homage_delivery_wheeze_liege0:"[ROOT.Char.GetTitledFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] is an interesting one. Clearly nervous of the spectacle
column2: and excited by their hurried arrival
column3: [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] seems to struggle even to breath
column4: rasping through the speech between breaks for air."

column1: homage_delivery_slow_liege0:"[ROOT.Char.GetTitledFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] speech is... not good. [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] loses [ROOT.Char.GetHerHis] train of thought at several points
column2: rambling into tangents
column3: and misunderstanding or mispronouncing some of the most important words."

column1: homage_delivery_inconceivable_liege0:"[ROOT.Char.GetTitledFirstNamePossessiveNoTooltip] speech is... interesting. [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe|U] inserts archaic language and weighty words [ROOT.Char.GetSheHe] clearly has no notion of the real meaning of
column2: doubling the length and my more learned courtiers over."

column1: homage_delivery_stutter_vassal0:"I have barely begun the first pledge when my stammer cuts me short. I eventually push on as the court watches with mirth and embarrassment
column2: but the day is marked by my affliction."

column1: homage_delivery_lisp_vassal0:"My speech is punctuated by stifled giggles as I try my best to enunciate around my lisp
column2: detracting from the weight of the ceremony and my pledge."

column1: homage_delivery_wheeze_vassal0:"I struggle to find the breath as my heart races faster
column2: and rushing to finish the speech only makes things worse. It is not a speech to remember."
but the raised eyebrows and looks of my liege and the court tell me my efforts have been amusing rather than momentous."

column1: homage_delivery_inconceivable_vassal0:"I pull out all the stops
column2: meeting the occasion and impressing the court with my great vocabulary
column3: though... the reaction is not exactly what I hoped for."

column2: my preparations to pay homage are no longer necessary..."
it must be directed to my new liege
column3: [ROOT.Char.GetLiege.GetTitledFirstNameRegnal]."

column1: pay_homage.0601_shared_intro0:"Just as I was putting the final touches on my oath of homage
column2: pay_homage.0601.desc0":"\n\nThis certainly changes the situation."
to greater things."
